title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming AI storage economics with Amazon S3 Vectors (STG318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Amazon S3 Vectors 转变 AI 存储经济性 (STG318)
abstract: Amazon S3 Vectors introduces native support for you to store, retrieve, and query vectors in S3. In this session, explore how S3 Vectors complements high-performance vector databases, reducing storage and querying costs by up to 90%. Learn how to integrate S3 Vectors with Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases and OpenSearch Service for RAG and semantic search at reduced cost and complexity. We’ll cover architecture design, performance considerations, and how S3 Vectors supports scalable AI agent memory and search. Also hear from S3 Vectors customer, March Networks, about using the feature to transform operations and power smart video search capabilities.
abstract_cn: Amazon S3 Vectors 引入了原生支持，让您能够在 S3 中存储、检索和查询向量。在本次会议中，探索 S3 Vectors 如何补充高性能向量数据库，将存储和查询成本降低高达 90%。了解如何将 S3 Vectors 与 Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases 和 OpenSearch Service 集成，以降低成本和复杂性实现 RAG 和语义搜索。我们将介绍架构设计、性能考虑因素，以及 S3 Vectors 如何支持可扩展的 AI 代理内存和搜索。还将听取 S3 Vectors 客户 March Networks 分享如何使用该功能转变运营并支持智能视频搜索能力。
